entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
